§ 620k. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated, out of any moneys in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, such sums as may be required to carry out the purposes of this chapter, but not to exceed $760,000,000. (Apr. 11, 1956, ch. 203, § 12, 70 Stat. 110.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
Change of Name Pub. L. 96–375, § 7, Oct. 3, 1980, 94 Stat. 1507, provided that: “The Curecanti Storage Unit of the Colorado River Storage Project constructed under the authority of the Act of April 11, 1956 (70 Stat. 106) [this chapter] is hereby designated and hereafter shall be known as the Wayne N. Aspinall Storage Unit of the Colorado River Storage Project. Any law, regulation, record, map, or other document of the United States referring to the Curecanti Storage Unit shall be held to refer to the Wayne N. Aspinall Storage Unit.”
